clue: A game played between two teams of eleven players with a round ball.
A sport played by two teams of five players where the objective is to shoot a ball through a hoop.
A racket sport that can be played individually against a single opponent or between two teams of two players each.
A bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each on a field with a diamond-shaped circuit.
A bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players on a circular field.
A contact team sport played with an oval ball that can be kicked, carried, or passed.
A game where players use clubs to hit balls into a series of holes on a course in as few strokes as possible.
A water sport that involves moving through water by using the arms and legs.
A team sport in which two teams of six players are separated by a net.
A game played on ice or a field, where players use sticks to hit a puck or ball into the opposing team's goal.
A collection of sports events that include running, jumping, and throwing.
A combat sport where two participants wear gloves and throw punches at each other.
A sport that involves riding bicycles for recreation, competition, or transportation.
A sport that involves exercises requiring balance, strength, flexibility, agility, coordination, and endurance.
A combat sport involving grappling techniques such as clinch fighting, throws, and takedowns.
A sport that involves riding and performing tricks on a skateboard.
A racquet sport played with a shuttlecock that is hit over a net.
A team sport played with a small rubber ball and a long-handled stick called a crosse.
A water sport where individuals ride on the face of moving waves using a surfboard.
A sport involving sword fighting with three disciplines: foil, épée, and sabre.
